discovery_rule.name: Hadoop cluster LLD
discovery_rule.description: Discovery rule to populate Hadoop cluster items

trigger_prototype.name: Hadoop cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} maintenance is ON

discovery_rule.name: Hadoop hosts LLD
discovery_rule.description: Discovery rule to populate Hadoop host items

item_prototype.name: Hadoop host commission state on cluster $1
Hadoop host health summary on cluster $1
Hadoop host last heartbeat on cluster $1
Hadoop host maintenance mode on cluster $1

trigger_prototype.name: Hadoop host commission state: Decommissioned
Hadoop host commission state: Decommissioning
Hadoop host health summary: Bad
trigger_prototype.description: Hadoop host health summary is BAD. You should check.

trigger_prototype.name: Hadoop host health summary: Concerning
trigger_prototype.description: Hadoop host health summary is CONCERNING. You should check.

trigger_prototype.name: Hadoop host last heartbeat more than 3 minutes ago
Hadoop host last heartbeat more than 6 minutes ago
Hadoop host last heartbeat more than 10 minutes ago
Hadoop host maintenance mode is ON
trigger_prototype.description:
Hadoop host {$HOSTNAME} maintenance mode is ON.
You can check {#HDPHOSTURL}

item_prototype.name: Hadoop role $3 for service $2 on cluster $1 check $4 result

discovery_rule.name: Hadoop role LLD
discovery_rule.description: Discovery rule to populate Hadoop role items

item_prototype.name: Hadoop role $3 for service $2 on cluster $1 commission state
Hadoop role $3 for service $2 on cluster $1 config stale
Hadoop role $3 for service $2 on cluster $1 health summary
Hadoop role $3 for service $2 on cluster $1 maintenance mode
Hadoop role $3 for service $2 on cluster $1 role state

trigger_prototype.name: Hadoop role {#HDPROLENAME} for service {#HDPSERVICENAME} on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} config stale
Hadoop role {#HDPROLENAME} for service {#HDPSERVICENAME} on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} health summary: Bad
Hadoop role {#HDPROLENAME} for service {#HDPSERVICENAME} on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} health summary: Concerning
Hadoop role {#HDPROLENAME} for service {#HDPSERVICENAME} on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} maintenance is ON
Hadoop role {#HDPROLENAME} for service {#HDPSERVICENAME} on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} role state: Stopped
Hadoop role {#HDPROLENAME} for service {#HDPSERVICENAME} on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} role state: Zombie

discovery_rule.name: Hadoop service LLD
discovery_rule.description: Discovery rule to populate Hadoop host items

item_prototype.name: Hadoop service $2 config stale on cluster $1
Hadoop service $2 health summary on cluster $1
Hadoop service $2 maintenance mode on cluster $1
Hadoop service $2 service state on cluster $1

trigger_prototype.name: Hadoop service {#HDPSERVICENAME} config stale on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME}
Hadoop service {#HDPSERVICENAME} health summary on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME}: Bad
Hadoop service {#HDPSERVICENAME} health summary on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME}: Concerning
Hadoop service {#HDPSERVICENAME} maintenance mode on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME} is ON
Hadoop service {#HDPSERVICENAME} service state on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME}: Stopped
Hadoop service {#HDPSERVICENAME} service state on cluster {#HDPCLUSTERNAME}: Zombie

item.name: Cloudera check
item.description: Single item to trigger all checks. Get this item will launch python script on cloudera manager server. The script will use Cloudera API to gather all metrics we need and send them as Zabbic Trappers

item.name: Cloudera discovery
item.description: Single item to trigger discovery. Get this item will launch python script on cloudera manager server. The script will use Cloudera API to discover all relevant metrics and send them as Low Level Discovery

item.name: Zabbix script version
item.description: Provides version number of script running on host to monitor Cloudera Hadoop. Should be same number as template user macro {$ZBX_TPL_VERSION}

trigger.name: Cloudera Hadoop Template and Script version mismatched
Hadoop Cloudera check failed
trigger.description: Hadoop Cloudera Checks failed at least 1 time during last 5 attemps. You should connect to Cloudera Manager Web Interface & investigate.

trigger.name: Hadoop Cloudera discovery failed
trigger.description: Hadoop Cloudera Discovery failed at least 1 time during last 5 attemps. You should connect to Cloudera Manager Web Interface & investigate.
